an5.159:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an5.159:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desento nisinno hoti.
an5.159:4.4: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivutaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an5.159:4.7: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.159:4.8: “āyasmā, bhante, udāyī mahatiyā gihiparisāya parivuto dhammaṃ desetī”ti.
an5.159:5.1: “Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
an5.159:5.2: Paresaṃ, ānanda, dhammaṃ desentena pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:5.4: ‘Anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:5.6: ‘anuddayataṃ paṭicca kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:5.7: ‘na āmisantaro kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo;
an5.159:5.8: ‘attānañca parañca anupahacca kathaṃ kathessāmī’ti paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
an5.159:5.9: Na kho, ānanda, sukaraṃ paresaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ.
an5.159:5.10: Paresaṃ, ānanda, dhammaṃ desentena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā paresaṃ dhammo desetabbo”ti.
